definition[0]: used to say that a particular kind of behaviour or situation is typical of someone or something, especially when you do not expect anything better from that person or thing
example[0]: I know it’s outrageous, but that’s Melissa for you.
definition[1]: used when you are annoyed or disappointed to say that something is the opposite of the quality you are mentioning
example[1]: Well, there’s gratitude for you! Here am I trying to help and you tell me not to interfere!
